title: Until what iOS version will the iPod Touch 4th generation be supported? - Quora

response.answer_text: I actually think that iOS 6 will be the last version supported as the 256MB RAM limit in the 4th gen iPod Touch really pushes the limit of the device. Same with the 3GS. The original iPad was cutoff now because it hasn't been sold for over a year (and not that many units relative to the 2nd and 3rd gen iPad)

Maximum OS: iOS 6.1.6*Details: *This model is partially supported by iOS 6. Most notably, it does not support Maps, Siri, Panorama, and FaceTime over cellular. It is not compatible with iOS 7 or later versions of the iOS at all.
